answers.answer: Hello.Which medicine were you prescribed ? It is important that the condition is diagnosed correctly and you are receiving the right medicine.If the leg burning has an origin in the spine, medicines may not help. Have you done an MRI of the spine ?There could be other causes also. Diabetes is an important cause of neuropathy, which can cause such burning.Regards

question: I am 47 years lady and having left leg burning, Doctor given medician eventhough no cure. Please help me what to do??????
